properties.name: spring-jda.annotation-configuration
properties.description: Enable the use of annotations to configure the SpringJDA context

properties.name: spring-jda.use-sharding
properties.description: Declare if the SpringJDA context should have shard support

properties.name: spring-jda.event-auto-register
properties.description: Enable the auto registration of all EventListener/ListenerAdapter beans

properties.name: spring-jda.token
properties.description: Discord bot token to login into Discord with
